title: Can Arne Slot revive this Frankenstein’s monster of a Liverpool side? | Barney Ronay
summary: The influx of new players has caused a dilution of the team spirit and collective determination traditionally fostered by Klopp. This change has led to challenges in maintaining unity within the team. Concerns are growing about the impact on performance and cohesion.

title: England deserve a tide of goodwill, yet somehow Jude Bellingham is still a target | Jonathan Liew
summary: Ian Wright argues that a specific midfielder is facing an outdated double standard in how they are treated compared to their peers. He highlights the inconsistency and bias in the criticism directed at the player. This observation brings attention to broader issues of fairness in sports evaluations.

title: Molly McCann: ‘I’m a scouse female gay athlete who supports Everton – it’s like my cards are marked already’
summary: Britain's top female UFC fighter explains her decision to avoid boxing in Saudi Arabia while expressing her determination to achieve a world title in the ring. She shares insights with journalist Donald McRae about her career aspirations and values. Her focus remains on pursuing success in a more favorable environment.

title: Players warned not to sign IPL-style Hundred deals in standoff with owners
summary: The Professional Cricketers’ Association has recommended that players refrain from signing contracts for The Hundred due to an ongoing dispute with the franchise owners. This move is aimed at protecting players' interests amidst uncertainties in the competition's administration. The situation highlights tensions between players and management in professional cricket.

title: Thursday news quiz: blindside shocks, volcano rocks and an airport pub unlocks
summary: Join the weekly trivia challenge every Thursday to test your knowledge on current events, pop culture, and general topics. It’s a fun way to see how well you stay informed. Compete and find out how you measure up!
